messages.message:
Hi Brian, 

I would like to introduce you to Sara Sullivan. Sara is one of our talent acquisition leads at CapTech. She is looking to fill a development position in Denver and would love the opportunity to talk to you about the position. If you want to reach out to her directly, you can send her an email at ssullivan@captechconsulting.com 

Let me know if you have any questions about CapTech or the Denver office. 

Thanks,
Leland
